nodes.text: Car Affa was a male Weequay arms dealer active on Coruscant during the Clone Wars.

In 22 BBY, Affa profited from selling Galactic Republic arms to the Confederacy of Independent Systems until he was apprehended by the Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker, who brought Affa to the Jedi Temple for questioning.
Car Affa bears a yellow smiley face on each shoulder of his clothing.
